Church Street Brewing Co.

About

We are a small and local nitro coffee pop up that specializes in naturally flavored cold brew. It all began as a side hustle located outside of Boston. Owners Denis and Amanda started selling nitro cold brew coffee at CrossFit competitions in 2015. From there, the business grew quickly, they created a large online presence shipping coffee nationwide. They are now opening up their first coffee bar and nano brewery in Canton, Massachusetts.

Our Vision

Our vision is to provide our community with the highest quality coffee and beer experience possible. While offering a unique space where people come together.
